FAQ.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Have a question about SmartYatra? Check out our FAQs to find answers to common queries.
FAQ.whatIsSmartYatraAnswer: SmartYatra is an innovative Public Transport Digitization System that enhances the passenger and driver experience by utilizing QR codes for bus tracking, automatic fare deduction, and streamlined bus management.
FAQ.howToGetStartedQuestion: How do I get started with SmartYatra?
FAQ.howToGetStartedAnswer: To get started with SmartYatra, simply register as a bus driver to automatically generate your bus’s QR code. Passengers can then scan the code to track their journey and make automatic fare payments as they enter and exit the bus.
FAQ.compatibilityQuestion: Is SmartYatra compatible with my existing public transport system?
FAQ.compatibilityAnswer: Yes, SmartYatra is designed to seamlessly integrate into your existing public transport system. Whether you operate a small fleet or a large network, SmartYatra can help modernize your operations with minimal disruption.
FAQ.languageSupportAnswer: Yes, SmartYatra supports multiple languages to cater to a wide range of users. Currently, it supports both English and Nepali, with more languages coming soon.
FAQ.updatesAnswer: SmartYatra is regularly updated to add new features, improve existing ones, and ensure the system remains in line with the latest public transport trends. Major updates are released quarterly, while smaller updates and improvements are rolled out as needed.
FAQ.pricingAnswer: SmartYatra offers a freemium model. The basic features, such as QR code generation for drivers and passenger journey tracking, are free. Advanced features like detailed reporting, analytics, and priority support are available through our paid plans. Check our pricing page for more details.
